title: First law of thermo - magnitude of W equal to Q

content.question: During which process, if any, is the amount of work done on the gas equal to the amount of energy that the gas exchanges with its surroundings through heating or cooling?

choices.label: None of the processes, because the amount of work done on the gas is always greater than the amount of energy that the gas exchanges with its surroundings through heating or cooling.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
